description: Listen to BBC local radio commentaries from the Premiership as Exeter Chiefs take on Newcastle Falcons, Bath face Harlequins and Gloucester host Bristol.
title: Premiership LIVE: Exeter Chiefs vs Newcastle Falcons, Bath vs Harlequins & Gloucester vs Bristol
